title: Mahindra & Mahindra to introduce 7 Electric Vehicles by 2030, starting in 2025
description: Mahindra & Mahindra announced plans to introduce seven battery electric vehicles by 2030, starting new models from 2025. The company aims to increase its EV production capacity, focusing on cost-effective LFP technology. The automaker is also exploring hybrid powertrain options and has secured a supply agreement with Volkswagen for electric components.
